name: Koala Kwest
description:
Bugs keep bugging you! Luckily, you are a koala who eats a lot of eucalyptus leaves... giving you amazing breath!

You can breath on them to shoo them away, since bugs only like stinky things.

Make it through twenty levels to win!

Move with the mouse! But it doesn't control your position, it controls your velocity! Make careful movements!

A non-violent arcade game!

Made for the Australian Bushfire Charity Jam.
